alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Lewis and Clark, Jefferson, and south central Teton Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles north of Ovando to near Warm Springs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, Lincoln, East Helena, Montana City, Basin, Augusta, Wolf Creek, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Clancy, Jefferson City, Wickes, Nilan Reservoir, Bean Lake and Elkhorn State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
